title: Naval Vessel Predictive Maintenance
description: A ship's monitoring system detects unusual vibration in a propeller shaft, indicating a potential future failure.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert from the ship's integrated condition assessment system (ICAS).
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineering officer acknowledges the alert.

tasks.description: Analyze the vibration data and trend analysis to assess the severity and timeline of the potential failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer determines the shaft can operate for another 30 days but requires inspection at the next port visit.

tasks.description: Schedule a dry dock inspection and order the necessary replacement parts to be ready at the next port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully plans the future maintenance to avoid an at-sea failure.
